text: Yara apanara kache anugatyera sapatha kare, tara to allahara kache anugatyera sapatha kare. Allahara hata tadera hatera upara rayeche. Ata'eba, ye sapatha bhanga kare; ati abasya'i se ta nijera ksatira jan'ye'i kare ebam ye allahara sathe krta angikara purna kare; allaha sattbara'i take mahapuraskara dana karabena.
